name: Yandex Map Editor Dark Theme
description:
Тёмная тема для Народной карты Яндекс
Автор: https://n.maps.yandex.ru/#!/users/225790763

Dark theme for Yandex Map Editor
Author: https://mapeditor.yandex.com/#!/users/225790763

style_setting_options.label: On

style_setting_options.value:
/* *//* ===== Map Brightness ===== */
ymaps[class$="ground-pane"]/*, .nk-on-map-gallery-view__full-image .nk-image img, .nk-on-map-gallery-view__preview-image .nk-image img, .nk-tracker-point-viewer-view__photo img*/ {opacity: 1 !important;}

/* ===== Map Brightness ===== */
ymaps[class$="ground-pane"]/*, .nk-on-map-gallery-view__full-image .nk-image img, .nk-on-map-gallery-view__preview-image .nk-image img, .nk-tracker-point-viewer-view__photo img*/ {opacity: .8 !important;}

/* ===== Map Brightness ===== */
ymaps[class$="ground-pane"]/*, .nk-on-map-gallery-view__full-image .nk-image img, .nk-on-map-gallery-view__preview-image .nk-image img, .nk-tracker-point-viewer-view__photo img*/ {opacity: .6 !important;}

style_setting_options.label: On
